# Overview

This repository is for reviewing the data files from the **Invasive high grade urothelial carcinoma (MIUC)** [case study](https://researchtothepeople.notion.site/william) part of Research for the People.

`r R.Version()[['version.string']]` 

IDE used: Positron

# Goal

Develop research that supports making a personalized neoantigen therapeutic.
